headline: A Look At CenterPoint Energy’s Valuation As Earnings Near And Grid Transparency Tools Expand
summary: Why CenterPoint Energy’s new tools matter ahead of earnings CenterPoint Energy (CNP) has rolled out a Community Progress Tracker, giving the public street level visibility into electric infrastructure upgrades across Greater Houston as investors watch for fourth quarter 2025 results on February 19. See our latest analysis for CenterPoint Energy. CenterPoint Energy’s recent launch of the Community Progress Tracker comes at a time when momentum in its stock has been picking up.
